DOC.brief_summary: Asthma is a highly prevalent chronic disease in children. Complementary and Alternative Medicine research on asthma showed a potential effect on pediatric patients. Studies looking at the effect of Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment seems to reveal positive results. The aim of study is to further explore the role of OMT on asthma in a pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment in Pediatric Asthma
DOC.criteria: children with asthma age between 5 and 14 associated comorbities surgical patients
